mapper.select: select * from one_room order by room_id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select room_type, living_floor, deposit, monthly_rent, subject, content, address from one_room
where (subject like #{search} || content like #{search} || address like #{search}) and (room_type=#{room_type}) and (living_floor like #{living_floor}) and (deposit >= #{deposit_min} and deposit <= #{deposit_max}) and (monthly_rent >= #{monthly_rent_min} and monthly_rent <= #{monthly_rent_max})
select count(*) from wish_list where id=#{id}
select * from one_room where room_id=#{room_id} and pass=#{pass}
